name: SMART LED GOOGLE TV PHILIPS 32” PULGADAS HD 32PHD6918/77
description: Smart LED Google TV. 32” HD screen (1366x768). Diagonal screen size (metric): 80 cm. Aspect ratio: 16:9. Audio output. Sound type: Dolby Audio. Clear and crisp dialogue. Powerful bass. Output power (RMS): 10 W. Speaker configuration: 5W x 2 speakers. Connections: Wi-Fi 802.11ac, 2x2, dual-band. Bluetooth 5.0. USB: 2. HDMI: 3. Other connections: Headphone output, IEC75 antenna, service connector, digital audio output (optical), Ethernet-LAN RJ-45. Digital audio output SPDIF: 1 (optical). Computer inputs on all HDMI: HDR compatible, HDR10/HLG. Video inputs on all HDMI: HDR compatible, HDR10/HLG (Hybrid Log Gamma). TDA tuner. Digital TV: ISDB-T. Pre-installed apps: YouTube, Amazon Prime Video, Google Play Movies, Google Play Music, Google Search, YouTube Music, Netflix. Flash memory size: 8 GB. Remote control: Voice. Dimensions with stand (height-width-depth): 45.4 x 71.7 x 17.6 cm. Includes: remote control, table stand, power cable, and 2 AAA batteries.

name: SOPORTE TV LED FIJO BE ONE BF2100
description: Fixed LED TV mount. Accepted size 26-60”. Accepted weight 35 kg.

name: SMART LED GOOGLE TV RCA 55” PULGADAS 4K UHD AND55P6UHD
description: Smart TV Google. 55” LED UHD 4K (3840 x 2160) screen. 16:09 screen format. 60Hz refresh rate. Audio outputs: optical S/PDIF (digital audio), headphone. RMS power: 2 x 9.5W. Connections: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, 1 RF (75 ohms) antenna/cable, 1 AV video, 1 R/L audio, 3 HDMI, 1 USB, 1 LAN. Includes infrared remote control and base stand.

name: LG Soundbar SC9S
description: The LG SC9S home theater system includes a compact soundbar and a wireless subwoofer. This 3.1.3-channel duo supports Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio tracks to create an immersive 3D sound around the users.
